name: Asuku Takahashi
title: Full Stack Developer
bio: Computer Science student at BYU-Hawaii specializing in full-stack web development. Passionate about building scalable web applications and enterprise systems. Currently working as a Student Developer/Analyst and SaaS Developer Intern, creating innovative solutions with modern technologies.

experience.company: Enterprise Information Systems at Brigham Young University – Hawaii
experience.description: Designed and maintained over 10 web applications for various university departments utilizing the Mendix low-code platform and Oracle DB, enhancing accessibility and user experience. Streamlined the university's database for user-friendly control by developing REST APIs using ASP.NET in C#, facilitating easier access for non-backend engineers through Docker containers. Assisted faculty and students in achieving an excellent university experience by maintaining and enhancing enterprise information systems for university applications, including troubleshooting, analyzing, and implementing improvements to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

Developed and enhanced a core feature of an unreleased SaaS product using React for front-end development, ensuring a seamless and responsive user interface for article editing tools. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement AI-driven content editing capabilities using GPT-based models, allowing users to generate, edit, and optimize content for media, social media, and blog posts. Conducted regular code reviews and implemented best practices for code quality, security, and performance, reducing bug frequency and enhancing maintainability.

profileProjects.title: Notion Database Application
profileProjects.description: Web application that integrates with Notion API to manage and interact with Notion databases, providing enhanced functionality for data management.

profileProjects.title: Script Translation API
profileProjects.description: API service that translates scripts and text content between multiple languages, streamlining multilingual content creation workflows.

profileProjects.title: Tango Learning App with Notion
profileProjects.description: Language learning application integrated with Notion for vocabulary management, helping users study Japanese efficiently with organized word lists.
